MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the DG8 postcode area of Whithorn. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:05pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the convenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:32pm on 13th November 2020.
